General.Name: UK Oil & Gas PLC
General.Description: UK Oil & Gas PLC operates as an oil and gas exploration and production company. The company holds interest in the Loxley, Horse Hill, Horndean, Avington, Broadford Bridge, and Portland gas storage fields in the United Kingdom; and Basur-Resan field in Turkey. UK Oil & Gas PLC was incorporated in 2004 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: The Broadgate Tower, London, United Kingdom, EC2A 2EW
